org.mini2Dx.ui.animation

Interface TextAnimation

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseTextAnimation, NullTextAnimation, TypingTextAnimation

    public interface TextAnimation
    Common interface for text animation implementations

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addTextAnimationListener(TextAnimationListener listener)
      Adds a TextAnimationListener to this TextAnimation
      void interpolate(java.lang.String text, float alpha)
      Interpolate the animation
      boolean isFinished()
      Returns if the TextAnimation has finished

      Removes a TextAnimationListener from this TextAnimation

      Renders the animation

      Sets the TextAnimation to be skipped
      void update(java.lang.String text, float delta)
      Update the animation

    • Method Detail

      • update

        void update(java.lang.String text,
          float delta)
        Update the animation
        Parameters:
        text - The target text to display
        delta - The time since the last frame (in seconds)

      • interpolate

        void interpolate(java.lang.String text,
               float alpha)
        Interpolate the animation
        Parameters:
        text - The target text to display
        alpha - The interpolation alpha value

      • render

        void render(java.lang.String text,
          Graphics g,
          float renderX,
          float renderY,
          float renderWidth,
          int hAlign)
        Renders the animation
        Parameters:
        text - The target text to display
        g - The Graphics context
        renderX - The render X coordinate
        renderY - The render Y coordinate
        renderWidth - The text render width
        hAlign - The horizontal alignment of the text

      • skip

        void skip()
        Sets the TextAnimation to be skipped

      • isFinished

        boolean isFinished()
        Returns if the TextAnimation has finished
        Returns:
        True if the animation has finished

      • addTextAnimationListener

        void addTextAnimationListener(TextAnimationListener listener)
        Adds a TextAnimationListener to this TextAnimation
        Parameters:
        listener - The TextAnimationListener to be added

      • removeTextAnimationListener

        void removeTextAnimationListener(TextAnimationListener listener)
        Removes a TextAnimationListener from this TextAnimation
        Parameters:
        listener - The TextAnimationListener to be removed
